Lead by Example If you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike} the target or make an @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.actions.oc0ZKnk5zD0GXqZi]{Area Fire} including the target before the end of your turn, you gain a status bonus to the damage roll equal to your Charisma modifier. Regardless of whether the attack hits, you and your allies gain a +1 status bonus on subsequent damage rolls against the target until the start of your next turn. Increase the damage by 1 at 5th, 10th, 15th, and 20th levels.
